thread.title: Tears and Terror: The Disturbing Final Years of Mickey Rooney

title: Tears and Terror: The Disturbing Final Years of Mickey Rooney
text:
Tears and Terror: The Disturbing Fina... Tears and Terror: The Disturbing Final Years of Mickey Rooney Next Story Prev Story 14 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
He was one of Hollywood's greatest actors, someone whose estate could have been worth hundreds of millions when he died in summer 2014. Instead, he endured beatings, humiliation and poverty at the hands of his eighth wife and one of her sons, both accused today of elder abuse and destroying a legend.   Hollywood Reporter.
